name: Zombie City (itch) (sa mi)
description:
There are many Zombies in City.

 A girl lives with her grandparents.

Her parents were killed by Zombies.

She must escape from City. and find  a safe place.

but her grandparents are old. She must go and fight Zombie  alone.

If she can find  a safe place, she will go back to her house to take her ground parents there.

How to play 

↑↓→←　up,  down,  right,  left

Z   bullet

X   special bomb  (press X for 0.5 seconds)

C  change bullet

Space   dash  

Esc   pause 

       continue

           quit      

Or  Xbox controller ,   gamepad

※Before you press continue button you must touch save point at first.
